name: streams-nodejs
description: [-] Introduction [-] Streams are not ONLY for Streaming videos/Audios [-] Understanding streams and Buffers [-] Create http server [-] Downloading big files from server (a good way and a bad way) [-] copy files on file system (a good way and a bad way) [-] create custom steams (Readable/ Writeble/Transform) [-] String processing (a good way and a bad way) [-] pipes [-] Types of Streams [-] Object mode in Streams [-] Handle error in streams
